mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_JOURNAL(JN_NO, JN_WDATE, MEM_NO, JN_SATISFACTION, JN_APPROVAL) VALUES(JN_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{jnWdate}, #{memNo},0,0)
INSERT INTO TBL_JNDETAIL(JND_NO, JND_PROGRESS, JND_NOTE, JN_NO, S_NO) VALUES(JND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{jndProgress}, #{jndNote}, #{jnNo}, #{sNo})
mapper.select: SELECT JN_NO FROM TBL_JOURNAL WHERE JN_WDATE = #{jnWdate} AND MEM_NO = #{memNo}
SELECT S_NAME FROM TBL_SCATEGORY WHERE S_NO = #{sNo}
SELECT S_NO , S_NAME FROM TBL_SCATEGORY WHERE L_NO = #{lNo}

SELECT g.MEM_NO , g.MEM_NAME , g.MEM_EMAIL, g.MEM_ZIPCODE, g.MEM_ADDR1, g.MEM_ADDR2, g.MEM_HIREDATE, g.MEM_POSITION, g.MEM_RES, g.DEPT_NO, g.JG_NO , g.JG_NAME, g.L_NO, g.L_NAME, g.JOB_NO, g.JOB_NAME, h.DEPT_NAME FROM (SELECT e.MEM_NO , e.MEM_NAME , e.MEM_EMAIL, e.MEM_ZIPCODE, e.MEM_ADDR1, e.MEM_ADDR2, e.MEM_HIREDATE, e.MEM_POSITION, e.MEM_RES, e.DEPT_NO, f.JG_NO , f.JG_NAME, f.L_NO, f.L_NAME, f.JOB_NO, f.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER e INNER JOIN (SELECT c.JG_NO , c.JG_NAME, d.L_NO, d.L_NAME, d.JOB_NO, d.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_JOBGROUP c INNER JOIN (SELECT a.L_NO, a.L_NAME, b.JOB_NO, b.JOB_NAME, b.JG_NO FROM TBL_LCATEGORY a INNER JOIN TBL_JOB b ON a.JOB_NO = b.JOB_NO) d ON c.JG_NO = d.JG_NO) f ON e.L_NO = f.L_NO) g INNER JOIN TBL_DEPT h ON g.DEPT_NO = h.DEPT_NO WHERE g.MEM_NO = #{memNo}
